# Rumours on Rust

> A café and catering business in Whangārei, New Zealand, serving fresh daily lunches, cabinet food, coffee, and catering services.

## About

Rumours on Rust is a café located at 25 Rust Avenue, The Avenues, Whangārei 0110, New Zealand. Open Monday to Friday, 7:30am–2:00pm. We serve daily rotating lunch boxes, freshly made cabinet food, quality coffee, and provide catering for events and workplaces.

- Phone: 021 134 5897
- Email: rumours.on.rust@gmail.com
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/p/Rumours-On-Rust-61577429531314/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rumoursonrust/

## Pages

- [Home](https://rumoursonrust.co.nz/): Daily lunch menu, cabinet food, testimonials, location and opening hours.
- [Catering](https://rumoursonrust.co.nz/catering): Kai Boxes, morning tea platters, corporate function catering, ordering process, and FAQs.
- [Contact](https://rumoursonrust.co.nz/contact): Phone, email, social links, opening hours, and location map.

## Menu Highlights

- **Daily Lunch Boxes**: Rotating menu, $13–$17, available for pickup or delivery via Uber Eats.
- **Cabinet Food**: Sandwiches, baps, salads, overnight oats, and sweet treats.
- **Dietary Options**: Vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, and vegetarian options available.

## Catering Services

- **Kai Boxes**: Individual portioned catering boxes for workplaces and events.
- **Morning Tea**: Platters for meetings and office functions.
- **Functions**: Custom catering for corporate events, celebrations, and gatherings.
- **Ordering**: At least 48 hours notice required. Order via phone or email.

## Opening Hours

- Monday–Friday: 7:30am–2:00pm
- Saturday–Sunday: Closed
